```diff
- 
+ const fs = require('fs');
+ const path = require('path');
+ 
+ // Read en.json as reference
+ const enData = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('locales/app/en.json', 'utf8'));
+ const enKeys = Object.keys(enData).sort();
+ 
+ // Languages to check
+ const languages = ['zh-CN', 'zh-HK', 'jp', 'ko'];
+ 
+ console.log('English keys count:', enKeys.length);
+ 
+ languages.forEach(lang => {
+   const filePath = `locales/app/${lang}.json`;
+   const data = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8'));
+   const keys = Object.keys(data).sort();
+   
+   console.log(`\n${lang} keys count:`, keys.length);
+   
+   // Find missing keys
+   const missingKeys = enKeys.filter(key => !keys.includes(key));
+   if (missingKeys.length > 0) {
+     console.log(`Missing keys in ${lang}:`, missingKeys);
+   }
+   
+   // Find extra keys (not in en.json)
+   const extraKeys = keys.filter(key => !enKeys.includes(key));
+   if (extraKeys.length > 0) {
+     console.log(`Extra keys in ${lang}:`, extraKeys);
+   }
+ }); 
```

```diff
- 
+ const fs = require('fs');
+ 
+ // Read en.json as reference
+ const enData = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('locales/app/en.json', 'utf8'));
+ const enKeys = Object.keys(enData).sort();
+ 
+ // Languages to check
+ const languages = ['zh-CN', 'zh-HK', 'jp', 'ko'];
+ 
+ console.log('English keys count:', enKeys.length);
+ 
+ languages.forEach(lang => {
+   const filePath = `locales/app/${lang}.json`;
+   const data = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8'));
+   const keys = Object.keys(data).sort();
+   
+   console.log(`\n${lang} keys count:`, keys.length);
+   
+   // Find missing keys
+   const missingKeys = enKeys.filter(key => !keys.includes(key));
+   if (missingKeys.length > 0) {
+     console.log(`Missing keys in ${lang}:`, missingKeys);
+   }
+   
+   // Find extra keys (not in en.json)
+   const extraKeys = keys.filter(key => !enKeys.includes(key));
+   if (extraKeys.length > 0) {
+     console.log(`Extra keys in ${lang}:`, extraKeys);
+   }
+ }); 
```
